mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.sku_id AS skuId, g.group_shop_id AS groupShopId, g.sku_group_shop_price AS skuGroupShopPrice, s.bar_code AS barCode, s.title AS title, s.img AS img, s.original_price AS originalPrice, s.vip_price AS vipPrice, s.stock, s.freeze_stock AS freezeStock FROM unimall_group_shop_sku AS g LEFT JOIN unimall_sku AS s ON s.id = g.sku_id WHERE id = #{id}
